A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was extremely disappointing. The entire casino trip was a waste of time and pointless. Not sure why the vice admiral didn't explain her plans. Snoke was set up to be this super powerful bad guy\, but he dies so easily without explaining who he was. Most of all\, Luke's story made no sense. It doesn't make sense that Luke\, the guy who turned Vador\, would give up on his nephew. It makes no sense that Luke wouldn't want to be found if he left R2D2 with a map. Last\, why kill off Luke? Star Wars is a Skywalker saga... Now Rey has all these powers and abilities with no explanation on how she learned them. Luke had Obi-Wan and Yoda\, who trains Rey now? Just extremely disappointing\,  shame on Disney.
